text: Roberto Calovi (born 26 March 1963) is an Italian former cyclist. He competed in the individual pursuit event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Trentino Category:Sportspeople from Trentino
title: Roberto Calovi
